EmailTemplate.description: Alert sent to the Lead owner when the DV respondent does not have direct knowledge about the wish child's condition.
EmailTemplate.name: Lead: No Direct Knowledge Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required: Medical Professional does not have direct knowledge of {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}’s condition
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.OwnerFirstName} {!Lead.OwnerLastName},
The medical professional who completed the DV for {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} has confirmed that this child is in a comatose or vegetative state. Therefore, they do not need to continue completing the DV form. Please manually change the child's Lead Status to DNQ and send any necessary communication.
If you feel this was selected in error, please reach out to the child's medical team to confirm, and resend a new DV if necessary.
Click here to view the child’s lead record: {!Lead.Link}
